name: nuclide-notifications
description: Provides native notification support for Nuclide & Atom

whenFocused.title: Show notifications when in focus
whenFocused.description: Display native notifications even when Nuclide is in focus.

onlyNativeFriendly.title: Show 'native friendly' notifications only.
onlyNativeFriendly.description: Only display certain important Atom alerts (such as those relating to long-running jobs) as native notifications. Leave this checked if you want to reduce your notification frequency.

versions.description: A function for raising native notifications.
